text:
Cultivate Labs | Senior Rails Developer | Chicago, IL | Onsite | Full-Time

Cultivate Labs is a Chicago-based company that helps large organizations crowdsource the wisdom of their employees to better predict future events, whether that’s a project milestone, sales target, or if an investment will pay off. We’re a self-funded team of 6, currently working with some of the largest and most influential organizations in the world like AbbVie, AstraZeneca, GE, Bose, the U.S. Intelligence Community, and others.

We’re embarking on our next phase of growth as a company and are looking to hire a new senior Rails developer to join the team and own product development of one or more efforts. Here’s more about the role: https://cultivatelabs.com/hiring
